name: Plastic Bank
text: Ocean plastic waste providing school tuition in 3rd world? YES!! With Expo 2020 Program in Haiti 232 children attended school & 6000+ taught about  plastics & recycling. Within schools we collected 248000 pounds of plastic :)  This is just the start!!! #socialplastic #amazing https://t.co/aQSNDtWSzV

name: Plastic Bank
text: Need something to cheer you up today? @plastic_bank visited this school & taught them about single use plastic and recycling...they were super excited!
